-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Shorten a variety of string-like types adding ellipsis
--   
--   A yesod goody, shorten strings
@package shorten-strings
@version 0.1.0.1


module Data.Shorten
class Shorten a
shorten :: Shorten a => Int -> a -> a
instance Shorten Text
instance Shorten String
